interpretation: The "hot springs" card represents a time of relaxation and rejuvenation. It signifies a need to take a break from the stresses of everyday life and indulge in self-care. This card can also suggest a need for healing, both physically and emotionally. It is a reminder to take care of oneself and prioritize personal well-being. The hot springs symbolize a place of warmth and comfort, where one can let go of their worries and find inner peace. Associated keywords include relaxation, healing, rejuvenation, self-care, warmth, and comfort. This card encourages you to take some time for yourself, whether it be a relaxing bath, a spa day, or simply taking a moment to breathe deeply and center yourself. Remember that taking care of yourself is not selfish, but necessary for your overall well-being.
